channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - permissive

item.title: Testing with permissive domains
item.description: When testing out new technologies or new setups, not having (proper) SELinux policies can be a nuisance. Not only are the number of SELinux policies that are available through the standard repositories limited, some of these policies are not even written with the same level of confinement that an administrator â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
